name: Sachin Kumar
bio: Currently I'm building ZKP2P (https://twitter.com/zkp2p), built on top of zk email and funded by a PSE grant, and zkCerts which I started building this as part of the latest Axiom Open Source Cohort. I'm excited about building zk apps that leverage off-chain provenant data and gave a talk on the same at ZK Summit 10 London. Excited to scale zk apps to solve some of the toughest long-standing challenges in crypto.
